transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Ji hi good afternoon Amit ji baat kar rahe hain Jai Mahakali Enterprise se?
Customer: Bataiye bhaiya.
Executive: Amit ji hi main Naveen baat kar raha tha senior manager India Mart se kaise hain aap?
Customer: Theek hai bhaiya.
Executive: Amit sir actually kal shayad aapki call aayi thi hamare paas customer care se I hope aap hi ne call kiya tha?
Customer: Ji bhaiya hum hi ne call kiya tha.
Executive: Bataiye Amit ji kya issue aa raha hai sir I think Himanshu se aapki baat bhi hui hai iske regarding aaj.
Customer: Bhaiya bhaiya bhaiya 15 din 20 din mein ek baar phone lagayenge to koi ehsan thodi na kar de rahe hain bhaiya India Mart India Mart jo ek itna bada platform hai na itni gandagi bhar gayi aapke yahan pe kya bata de koi manage karne wala nahi hai.
Executive: Hai na? Achcha kya issue aa raha hai sir?
Customer: Ye hame takleef nahi hai bhaiya ki hamara paisa lag gaya hai to hame koi hame koi dikkat nahi hai sab Radhe hai lekin ye hai ki India Mart ka India Mart ko main ek parivar ke jaise samajhta hun wo agar aaj is is condition mein situation mein fasa hua hai to bahut takleef hoti hai bas itni si takleef hai hame wo koi samasya nahi hai theek hai hame nahi milega to nahi milega koi dikkat nahi hai hame.
Executive: Nahi aap aap kya dhandha ki baat kar rahe hain sir ki aapko business nahi ho raha India Mart se ya koi aur dikkat aa rahi hai?
Customer: Are bhaiya koi koi bhi koi jankari koi information koi bhi kya hame problem ho rahi kisi se koi matlab nahi hai sirf farzi baatein karna hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm haan.
Executive: Sir kahin pe agar aisa issue
Customer: Haan haan to India Mart ke social media account pe hum main abhi abhi to hum thoda busy the to unka call aa raha tha lekin hame ek social media account pe unke ek mail karna hai personal ki bhaiya ye jo India Mart mein aapke paas worker kaam kar rahe hain na wo sirf dhan le rahe hain aapse aur koi karya nahi kar pa rahe hain koi bhi vyapari aapse santusht nahi hai lagbhag 38 38 customer hai hamare paas jo bada plan leke ruke rakhe hue hain aur wo aaj pareshan hai.
Executive: Sir yahan pe dekhiye sir jitne supplier India Mart pe hai jo aapki industry mein deal karte hain clay modifier mein aap deal karte hain sir aur aisa nahi Amit ji unko achcha business bhi ho raha hai India Mart se tabhi wo yahan pe hame kyun nahi ho raha bhaiya hame kyun nahi ho raha hai?
Executive: Sir wahi main jaanna chah raha tha agar kahin pe koi aisi dikkat hai to usko samne solve karna jaruri hai pehle main samjhu aap bhaiya koi milega to koi koi person milega tab karoge na bhaiya.
Executive: Kya dobara boliye sir kya keh rahe hain?
Customer: Jab koi vyakti aapko suggest karne wala milega tab karoge na.
Executive: Sir suggest karna matlab kaise kaam karna hai wo bilkul hum suggest karna chahenge sir ki inquiry badhengi kaise kaise karna hai wo sari cheeze main samjhana chahta hun.
Customer: Koi nahi karta bhaiya koi nahi karta koi bhi nahi karta malik maine aapko bola aisa kyun lag raha hai Amit ji kyun nahi koi karega bhaiya main lagbhag jab jab se main plan liya hun ji itni baar logo se baat kar chuka aur main aapko bata raha hun jab main ek weekly matlab jab normal wala jab maine plan liya tha na bhaiya ji main itna achcha itna achcha wo rehta tha na ki kya hi keh du aapko.
Executive: Sir bilkul raha hoga sir tabhi aapne ja ke ye maximizer liya kuch aapko waha fayda dikha hoga tabhi aapne liya but dekhiye Amit ji agar aapko aisa lag raha hai sir ki yahan maximizer leke fayda nahi ho raha main with surety aapko deta hun sir ki India Mart pe jo inquiry hum generate kar rahe hain clay modifier ki utni inquiry market mein aur koi nahi dega sir lekin baat ye rahi sir ki aapko inquiry badhani kaise hai Amit ji kaise hum kaam kare ki inquiry badhe aur buyer aapko approach kare us cheez ke liye sir guidance bilkul aapne bola ki guidance chahiye hota hai us batana bhi banta hai aur main chahunga Amit ji ki is bare mein hum ek bar video meeting pe discuss karein taki jo jo kami mujhe lag rahi hai sir kis pe kaam karna hai isse aapki inquiry badh sakti hai wo us pe hum baat kar lete hain sir kai matlab kai cheeze hain sir matlab aapne jo India Mart pe product bhi dale hain us pe bhi bahut jarurat hai kaam karne ki 38% aapka product scoring hai aur ye follow up bhi mujhe dekhna hai sir ki aap follow up kaise kar rahe hain apne customer ko ya buyer ko jo aap baat kar rahe hain to usse follow up kaise aapka ho raha hai to wo bhi main ek bar samajhna chahunga agar aap Amit ji free hai free hai after lunch to ek bar video meeting kar lete hain already mujhe 15 minute baad aap mujhe call back kariye main aapse baat karta hun jo google meeting jo bhi aap kahenge wo hum karne ke liye wo hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir ek bar video meeting karte hain aur samajhte hain sir kya issue aa raha hai bilkul bhaiya.
Executive: Theek hai okay okay thank you so much.
Customer: Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Feels no one manages the IndiaMART platform.

- Thinks IndiaMART workers are not doing their job.

- Feels no one cares about customer problems.

- Current plan is not as good as previous plan.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a video meeting to discuss issues.

- Executive wants to discuss product listing improvements.

- Executive wants to discuss follow-up strategies.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back in 15 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, product listing, customer support, follow up
